sources.title: Twister's Revenge!
sources.description: Three bumbling criminals have been trying to get their hands on the computerized control system of Mr. Twister, a talking monster truck with a mind of its own.

metadata.Plot: Three bumbling criminals have been trying to get their hands on the computerized control system of Mr. Twister, a talking monster truck with a mind of its own.
metadata.Writer: William Arthur, Larry Dreyfus, Bill Rebane
metadata.Actors: Dean West, Meredith Orr, David Alan Smith
